Bjelogrlić: Napali su mog sina ali je jasno da sam prava meta bio ja

05 Nov 2019, 13:50












Glumac i producent Dragan Bjelogrlić rekao je danas na konferenciji za novinare da je njegov sin Aleksej pre 14 meseci izazvao saobraćajnu nezgodu u kojoj je povredjen motocilista kome je slomljena noga, ali da nije tačno da je on nakon toga pobegao sa lica mesta, već je pozvao i sačekao hitnu pomoć koja je povredjenog odvezla u Urgentni centar, dovezao se kući, a zatim je i prijavio nezgodu u Policijskoj stanici Vračar.Bjelogrlić je na konferenciji za novinare u Medija centru rekao da su mediji do sada o njemu objavili 1.000 tekstova, ali da je ovo prvi put da javno reaguje zato što je napadnuta porodica odnosno njegov sin, koji ima 19 godina."Moj sin jeste izazvao saobraćajnu nezgodu u kojoj je povredjen jedan čovek, ali niti ga je zgazio, niti je pobegao sa lica mesta. Kasnije je pokrenut regularni sudski postupak. Nakon 14 meseci od tog dogadjaja, a jedan dan od gostovanja kod Ivana Ivanovića, u noći premijere moje serije 'Senke nad Balkanom' pojavljuju se dva teksta koja stavljaju mog sina na stub srama, ali je svima jasno da sam ja meta", kazao je Bjelogrić i dodao da je Aleksej bio uzeo njegov automobil bez njegovog znanja.Bjelogrlić je rekao da je u medjuvremenu dobio informacije i da se "spremaju tekstovi o njegovoj ćerki i o njemu i da će to tako ići u nedogled"."To su ustanovljene metode ućutkivanja i zastrašivanja slobodnomislećih ljudi. Ko god da to radi i stoji iza ovoga, nisam se uplašio. Ali ne dirajte decu i porodicu, ne samo meni već nikome, nijednoj javnoj ličnosti, to je gnusno i to se ne radi. Ja sam uvek bio slobodan čovek, uvek sam govorio šta mislim i to ću da radim i dalje, nećete me ućutkati ko god da ste", rekao je Bjelogrlić.Bjelogrlić je naveo da je "atmosfera hajke stvarnost u kojoj živimo i koja je grozna"."Glumci su specifična profesija, stalno su u žiži javnosti i ne sme zbog toga da im bude uskraćeno pravo na mišljenje ili političko opredeljenje", rekao je Bjelogrlić i dodao da su Nenad Jezdić, Branislav Trifunović i Nikola Kojo glumci koji su zbog sličnih dogadjaja odlučili da napuste Srbiju.Pravni zastupnik porodice Bjelogrlić Goran Draganić je odgovarajući na pitanje da li će biti pokrenuta tužba protiv dva medija koji su objavili poluistinite informcije o saobraćajnoj nezgodi koju je izazvao Aleksej Bjelogrlić rekao da je "u ovom trenutku najvažnije da cela Srbija sazna istinu, a da će odluku o tome da li će biti pokrenut sudski postupak porodica doneti kasnije".Advokat je rekao i da je protiv Alekseja Bjelogrlića tada odbačena krivična prijava, ali da je ceo postupak vodjen isto kao prema bilo kom drugom tinejdžeru i gradjaninu Srbije i u skladu sa Krivičnim zakonom, kao i da je postupak okončan tako što je po nalogu javnog tužioca oštećenom isplaćeno 1.200 evra.Podršku Draganu Bjelogrliću su svojim prisustvom na konferenciji za novinare dali i glumci Vesna Trivalić, Gordan Kičić i Viktor Savić.

Bjelogrlic: They attacked my son, but it's clear that I was the real target

05 Nov 2019, 12:50












Actor and producer Dragan Bjelogrlic told a news conference today that his son Alexey caused a traffic accident 14 months ago in which a motorcycle driver who had a broken leg was injured, but that it was not true that he subsequently fled the scene but called and waited for an ambulance that drove the injured to the Emergency Center, drove home, and then reported the accident at the Vracar Police Station. Bjelogrlic said at a press conference at the Media Center that 1,000 texts had been published so far about him, but that this is the first time he has reacted publicly because his family, that is, his son, who was 19. was attacked. "My son did cause a car accident in which one man was injured, but neither stepped on him nor fled the scene. After 14 months of that event, and one day after my appearance with Ivan Ivanovic, two texts appear on the night of the premiere of my series 'Shadows over the Balkans' which put my son on a pillar of shame, but it is clear to everyone that I am the target, "Bjelogric said, adding that Alexei had taken his car without his knowledge. Bjelogrlic said that he had received information in the meantime and that" texts were being prepared about his daughter and about him and that it will go on forever. "" These are established methods of silencing and intimidating free-thinking people. Whoever does this and stands behind this, I was not scared. But don't touch the children and the family, not just me but anyone, no public figure, it's disgusting and it's not done. I was always a free man, I always said what I mean and I will continue to do this, you will not silence me, whoever you are, "said Bjelogrlić. Bjelogrlić stated that" the atmosphere of the chase is a reality in which we live and that is awful. " "Actors are a specific profession, they are constantly in the spotlight and should not be denied the right to an opinion or political choice," said Bjelogrlic, adding that Nenad Jezic, Branislav Trifunovic and Nikola Kojo are actors who are due to similar events. The legal representative of the Bjelogrlic family, Goran Draganic, responded to a question whether a lawsuit would be filed against two media outlets that published semi-truthful information about a car accident caused by Alexei Bjelogrlic, saying that "at this point it is most important for the whole of Serbia to find out the truth , and that the decision on whether to initiate court proceedings will be taken by the families later. " criminal charges, but that the entire proceeding was conducted in the same way as any other teenager and citizen of Serbia and in accordance with the Criminal Code, as well as that the proceedings were completed by the payment of € 1,200 by order of the public prosecutor to the injured party. Actors Vesna Trivalic, Gordan Kicic and Viktor Savic also gave a press conference.
